title: Emerging Clinical Applications for Cannabis and Cannabinoids
description:
Title: Emerging Clinical Applications for Cannabis and Cannabinoids
Author: Paul Armentano, Deputy Director NORML
Paperback: 79 pages
Publisher: NORML Foundation; 6th edition (2014)
Language: English
ASIN: B00MI5LYFU

A summary of recent scientific literature relating to the therapeutic and medicinal uses of cannabis and cannabinoids. Such literature discusses Alzheimer's disease, chronic pain, Tourette's syndrome, sleep apnea, and several other medical conditions.

For patients and their physicians, this report can serve as a primer for those who are considering using or recommending medical cannabis. For others, this report can serve as an introduction to the broad range of emerging clinical applications for cannabis and its various compounds
